text: Billie Honor Whitelaw, CBE (6 June 1932 â€“ 21 December 2014) was an English actress. Whitelaw was born in Coventry and was raised in Bradford. She was known for working with Samuel Beckett. Whitelaw was known for her roles in The Omen and in Hot Fuzz. Whitelaw died in Hampstead, London, England, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Video of Billie Whitelaw performing Beckett's Not I Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Bradford Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:People from Coventry
title: Billie Whitelaw
